section.section: There is a Sustainable Forestry Council in the Department.

text.section: There is a Park Advisory Commission in the Department.

section.section: The Sustainable Forestry Council shall have 9 members.
Members of the Council shall be appointed by the Governor, with the advice of the Secretary, to serve at the pleasure of the Governor.
The Park Advisory Commission shall have 12 members.
Members of the Park Advisory Commission shall be appointed by the Governor, with the advice of the Secretary, to serve at the pleasure of the Governor.
